channel.title: Storybooks Minnesota
channel.description: Storybooks Minnesota is designed specifically for teachers, parents, and community members. It makes 40 stories from the African Storybook available in English as well as the major heritage, immigrant and refugee languages of Minnesota, with stories and audio in English, Amharic, Arabic, French, German, Mandarin, Norwegian, Oromo, Russian, Somali, Spanish, Swedish, and Vietnamese, among others.
